rules_text:
Reborn 1–{3}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
Other creatures you control get +1/+1 for each +1/+1 counter on Nevendell Escort.
